Package org.apache.struts2.sitemesh

Class Summary
FreemarkerDecoratorServlet This is a SiteMesh FreeMarker view servlet.
FreemarkerMapper2DecoratorSelector Returns a OldDecorator2NewStrutsFreemarkerDecorator decorator for a Freemarker request.
FreemarkerPageFilter Core Filter for integrating SiteMesh + Freemarker into a Java web application.
NoneDecoratorMapper Won't decorate the output if it finds a "decorator" flag in the request
OldDecorator2NewStrutsDecorator Adapts a SiteMesh 2 Decorator to a SiteMesh 3 Decorator.
OldDecorator2NewStrutsFreemarkerDecorator Extends OldDecorator2NewStrutsDecorator to add Struts functionality for Freemarker
OldDecorator2NewStrutsVelocityDecorator Extends OldDecorator2NewStrutsDecorator to add Struts functionality for Velocity
StrutsSiteMeshFactory  
VelocityDecoratorServlet This is a SiteMesh Velocity view servlet.
VelocityMapper2DecoratorSelector Returns a OldDecorator2NewStrutsVelocityDecorator decorator for a velocity request.
VelocityPageFilter Core Filter for integrating SiteMesh into a Java web application.
